## Before Class Begins 

If you have a question before class begins, send it by email to Dr. Love at `thomas dot love at case dot edu`.

## TA Office Hours

Attend TA office hours to get one-on-one help or share a computer problem. TA office hours are held via Zoom, and will begin in mid-January.

Zoom information to join these sessions will be posted to our **Shared Google Drive** when available.
